name: Davidoff Perfume
short_description: The brand expanded into perfumes, leather goods and accessories in the 1980s. The first fragrance introduced by the company was Davidoff for Men, in 1984. The Davidoff brand achieved remarkable success with the introduction of Cool Water, one of the first in the Aromatic Aquatic fragrance category and often imitated by men's fragrances in the decade that followed. The Davidoff brand continues to offer fragrances for men and women in conjunction with Coty.  http://shopping.rediff.com/product/davidoff-perfume--davidoff-champion-spray-for-men/11485818
